revised_title: John Burdon Sanderson Haldane's Life and Work in India
tldr: This article discusses the life and work of John Burdon Sanderson Haldane, a prominent scientist, in India. Haldane's interest in India began during his time recuperating from war wounds, and he eventually moved there to work on research projects involving Indian plant and animal species, as well as human populations. The article highlights Haldane's contributions to theoretical and experimental genetics, physiology, and enzyme chemistry, as well as his influence on Indian science and his unique lifestyle in India.
